content: the row without turning chart knit until bor and knit the 7 9 11 ds knit through both note there are 4 2 4 edge sts on each legs of the ds like a k2tog side and 2 3 3 repeats of 8 sts in between follow chart or written knit until chart portion work next row instructions for top of foot from where you have marked of top of foot knit as established continuing chart row chart or written instructions place bor 1-8 repeat row 1-8 until 2 1 inches/ 5 3 cm marker work as established for a total of 2 from desired final length of foot mark row rounds working chart over the top of foot you have stopped on your chart and knitting heel knit 18 20 22 3 continue heel short row turn work so the wrong side is facing you finishing row 4 ws ds p 11 turn weave in ends with tapestry needle soak row 5 rs ds knit to ds k the ds and 1 st socks in lukewarm water for 15 - 20 after it turn minutes press out water with a towel row 6 ws ds purl to ds p the ds and 1 place on sock blockers or lay flat to air dry st after it turn repeat row 5 and 6 until you are on the right side row 5 and the last st is ds knit ds knit 4 2 4 place bor marker leg of sock you will now work 6 7 8 repeats of main repeat chart or written instructions until bor repeat row 1-8 of main repeat chart or written instructions until 1 inch/ 2 5 cm from the desired length of leg knit 3 rounds of stockinette work k1tbl p1 twisted st ribbing for 12 rounds bind off using tubular bind off or jenny s surprisingly stretchy bind off 4 row 1 rs sl 1 k1 14 15 18 times top down pattern row 2 ws sl 1 purl to end of row cuff repeat row 1 and 2 until there are 12 14 18 slipped sts on the side of the heel flap using your preferred stretchy method co 48 56 64 join for working in the round heel turn mark the beginning of the round with a stitch marker row 1 rs sl 1 k 14 16 18 ssk k1 turn row 1 k1tbl p1 row 2 ws sl 1 p 7 p2tog p1 turn repeat cuff rib row 1 for 1 inch/ 2 5 cm row 3 rs sl 1 knit to 1 st before gap ssk leg k1 turn row 4 ws sl 1 purl to 1 st before gap knit 3 rounds of stockinette work 6 7 8 p2tog p1 turn repeats of main repeat chart or written instructions until bor continue repeating repeat row 3 and 4 until 16 18 20 sts row 1-8 until desired length of leg remain stopping after completing row 8 stop 4
